name: Seedling Boy Needs a New Home !
name_original: Seedling Boy Needs a New Home !
description:
A Seedling Wakes up to a Winter Landscape after Oversleeping. He Can No Longer Plant Himself to Become a Strong Tree so he Searches for a New home.

Controls:

Arrow Keys - Controls 

A - To Go Through Dialog

Space - To Start the Game

Credits:

Code - Liquid 

Engine Development  - Liquid 

Story/Idea - My2 Dev Team
